Data Destruction while working in the Bridgewater DF account\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each Bridgewater DF account member is responsible for data destruction while working in the Bridgewater DF account. When particular Customer data or EPAM Bridgewater DF account data not required anymore for service activities, such data have to be removed from local PC or laptop or from any other instance with such data. If you know that particular data not needed for your activities, but you are not sure about other Bridgewater DF account member, please ask your manager bout further actions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.2. Data Destruction when exiting the Bridgewater DF account\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the end of your last day of engagement in Bridgewater DF account, Bridgewater DF account member must delete all information related to Customer or EPAM Bridgewater DF account from local PC or laptop unless any other action was specified by your manager. After data\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Â \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"destruction\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", Bridgewater DF account member has to wright an email to his/her manager confirming the fact of Data destruction.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
